trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Conway
There were no other sightings in Conway on or around September 10th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsme and a buddy was driving on passaconway road and all of sudden out of now where we saw something that looked like a ball of fire moving very slow in the sky and it went for a good 10 min and it kept on getting higher in the sky. it was a basketball size and bright ornage and red and it was at about tree line height. then after a few min it faded away it was medded up and if any one could help me with this it would be great thank. i was kinda freaking out because i never ever seen anything like it before. we drove to another field fast then we saw it fade out
